item.title: Spring Data Access JPA
item.description: Java Persistence API (JPA) is historically part of the Java EE platform. It defines a standard Java API dealing with relational databases. EclipseLink (formerly Oracle TopLink) is considered a reference implementation but Red Hat (formerly JBoss) Hibernate ORM has significantly influenced the current shape of JPA.
